item.description:
Join us for the Japanese style BBQ in Cochituate State Park!
Bring your family and friends!!

We will bring lots of restaurant quality meat and veges to cook out under the blue New England sky.
Cochituate State Park is a popular regional day use park featuring water based recreational opportunities including boating, swimming, windsurfing, and fishing on its three large lakes.

July 18th (Sat) 12pm ~ 3pm (rain date - 19th Sun. 12pm ~ 3pm)

$20/person - adult
$5/child - 3 ~ 11years old
Free/under 3years old
Please note that cancellation fee will apply if you cancel after 16th(Thur) 5pm.

We will be providing the food and drinks (no alcohol - it's against the law to be drinking outdoors in public in Massachusetts).

Let us know if you need a ride to get there. We may be able to help you find a ride.
Parking at the park is $5

Please check www.jrex.us if the weather is unsure on the day of the event. We will post if we are on or not at 7am of the day of the event.


Park Directions
Cochituate State Park is located in the greater Boston area in eastern Massachusetts.
From East or West: Massachusetts Turnpike (Rte. I-90) to exit 13, Rte. 30 east. Park is on the right.

From Mass Pike: Take the Mass Turnpike (Rt. I-90) to Exit 13 to Rt. 30 East. The park is Â½ mile down on the on the right.

From Route 9: Follow Route 9 East or West to the Speen Street exit in Framingham. Go North on Speen Street. Follow Speen Street for 1 mile until you come to Route 30. Turn right onto Route 30. Park is 200 yards down on the right hand side.

Hope you can make it!
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting by the steps in front of the rest room
item.name: Japanese Style BBQ - YAKINIKU da~!!!!
